ResourceHeader.ResourceName: The BAS A84 Search Coil Instrument.
ResourceHeader.Description: The Search Coil instrument recording geomagnetic micropulsation data at frequencies less than about 10 Hz at the BAS A84 geomagnetic observatory at about 84.0 GLat, 334.0 East Glong.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: Please acknowledge Mark J. Engebretson, Augsburg College (2211 Riverside Avenue, Minneapolis, MN 55454-1338, USA) for use of data from the BAS A84 SearchCoil instrument.
